Knowledge Representation

Using the Agudeza Ontology to represent knowledge

Representing Knowledge Using the Agudeza Ontology

In order to represent knowledge using the Agudeza Ontology, the ontology has been used to create, populate, and visualise an RDF knowledge graph to represent the agudeza-universe of each of the 3 initial critics. The same steps could be taken to represent the agudeza-universe of any critic of the Agudeza.

The Python code depicting the creation of the 3 knowldege graphs is provided below, and can is available here.

The above graphs were serialised in Turtle format before being inputted into the RDF Grapher to create the following visualisations. The ttl files are available here.
